content: NCAR/NOAA/NREL Open Hackathon and collaborative coding days scheduled for February 27th to 29th, 2024, with virtual intro day on Feb 21st. The event will support hybrid virtual/in-person participation at NOAA's DSRC center in Boulder, CO. NCAR, NOAA, or NREL affiliated applicants will receive priority consideration for acceptance. Application period extended one week to Dec 13th in order to encourage additional applications.
